name: A Thing With Feathers
description:
A Thing With Feathers

Description

You are a tern.

In this bleak corner of the world, your kind are viewed as an omen that bodes well for the future. Your mere presence is enough to lift a person's spirits, but fortunately you are more than just an inspiring sight. Bring consideration, grace, and fearlessness to everything you do, and you will grant much-needed hope to those who lie in your way.

Controls

Move with the arrow keys or WASD keys

Press [Enter] to advance dialogue / speed up text

Estimated Playtime

10 - 20 minutes

Additional Credits

This game includes Emily Dickenson's poem "'Hope' is the thing with feathers".

Iron Maiden references also exist in the game.
